name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TextButler, Your ChatGPT AI Gmail Assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compose smarter, faster, and more efficient emails with TextButler, your AI-powered assistant for Gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How does TextButler help me write emails?
TextButler uses AI to generate ideas or draft complete emails based on the context of your message. It can also suggest improvements in word choice and structure to help you compose effective emails.

How can I start using TextButler?
Simply install the TextButler extension from the Chrome Web Store, log in to your Gmail account, and you're ready to start composing smarter, faster emails!

How much does it cost?
TexButler is free as long as you have an OpenAI ChatGPT account. If you want unlimited access without the need for a ChatGPT account, we also have PRO accounts for those that want all of ChatGPT integrated into your email at a lower price than a ChatGPT Plus account.

How does TextButler ensure data privacy?
TextButler strictly adheres to privacy guidelines to ensure your data remains secure. It doesn't store or share your data without your explicit consent. However as TextButler is powered by ChatGPT, by using TextButler, your data will be processed by OpenAI. Please refer to OpenAI's privacy policy
